# Pull Request

Thank you for your contribution! Please include the following information when opening a PR.

- **Type of change**: (fix, feat, docs, style, refactor)
- **Related issue**: (# if applicable)
- **Description**: A short description of the changes and rationale.
- **Testing**: How was this tested? (manual steps / unit tests)
- **Checklist**:
  - [ ] Branch from latest `main`
  - [ ] Tests added/updated where applicable
  - [ ] Documentation updated if necessary

We use small, focused PRs â€” please avoid large unrelated changes in a single PR.
